title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 1, 2024

We will also reveal today’s solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout the show, but we’ll provide the solution for the final puzzle first. Earlier today, it was revealed that Pat Sajak will be returning for a single episode […] The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for November 1, 2024 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle for November 1, 2024, along with the solutions to the other puzzles and toss-ups.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 1, 2024. We will also reveal today’s solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout the show, but we’ll provide the solution for the final puzzle first. Earlier today, it was revealed that Pat Sajak will be returning for a single episode in 2024 on December 2 for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune before the season starts in earnest in 2024. For tonight’s match, Ryan Seacrest will continue to host the regular show. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 1. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, November 1, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – ROOMY CONDO (Place) Tossup #1 – ROLLING IN THE DEEP (Song Title) Tossup #2 – PLAYING WATER POLO (Fun & Games) Regular Puzzle #1 – UNBELIEVABLE LOCATION (Place) Regular Puzzle #2 – COFFEE, AMBITION, SOUP, TEA (Cup of What?) Regular Puzzle #3 – CHICKEN-FRIED STEAK SMOTHERED IN GRAVY (Food & Drink) Tossup #3 – SCHOOL NEWSPAPER (Thing) Tossup #4 – TERM PAPER (Thing) Tossup #5 – PAPER AIRPLANE (Thing) Regular Puzzle #4 – THIS IS MY KIND OF PLACE (Phrase) As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, October 31: Bonus Round Puzzle – ALWAYS ON THE MOVE (Phrase) Tossup #1 – LOVE AT FIRST SIGHT (Phrase) Tossup #2 – DESPICABLE ME (Movie Title) Regular Puzzle #1 – SKELETONS, SPIDERS & SCARECROWS (Same Letter) Regular Puzzle #2 – TWENTY-FOUR-HOUR ROOM SERVICE (Thing) Regular Puzzle #3 – THE TOP OF THE EIFFEL TOWER (Place) Tossup #3 – FORMULATING A PLAN (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #4 – STICKING TOT HE PLAN (What Are You Doing?) Tossup #5 – COMING UP WITH PLAN B (What Are You Doing?) Regular Puzzle #4 – SMART DISHWASHER (In The Kitchen)
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer for November 1, 2024. We will also reveal today’s solutions for all the tossups and regular puzzles throughout the show, but we’ll provide the solution for the final puzzle first. Earlier today, it was revealed that Pat Sajak will be returning for a single episode in 2024 on December 2 for Celebrity Wheel of Fortune before the season starts in earnest in 2024. For tonight’s match, Ryan Seacrest will continue to host the regular show. Here are all of the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for November 1.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, November 1, 2024 and the categories (in parentheses) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ROOMY CONDO (Place)
  • Tossup #1 – ROLLING IN THE DEEP (Song Title)
  • Tossup #2 – PLAYING WATER POLO (Fun & Games)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – UNBELIEVABLE LOCATION (Place)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – COFFEE, AMBITION, SOUP, TEA (Cup of What?)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – CHICKEN-FRIED STEAK SMOTHERED IN GRAVY (Food & Drink)
  • Tossup #3 – SCHOOL NEWSPAPER (Thing)
  • Tossup #4 – TERM PAPER (Thing)
  • Tossup #5 – PAPER AIRPLANE (Thing)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THIS IS MY KIND OF PLACE (Phrase)

As a recap of yesterday’s episode, here are the puzzle answers for Thursday, October 31:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – ALWAYS ON THE MOVE (Phrase)
  • Tossup #1 – LOVE AT FIRST SIGHT (Phrase)
  • Tossup #2 – DESPICABLE ME (Movie Title)
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – SKELETONS, SPIDERS & SCARECROWS (Same Letter)
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TWENTY-FOUR-HOUR ROOM SERVICE (Thing)
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – THE TOP OF THE EIFFEL TOWER (Place)
  • Tossup #3 – FORMULATING A PLAN (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #4 – STICKING TOT HE PLAN (What Are You Doing?)
  • Tossup #5 – COMING UP WITH PLAN B (What Are You Doing?)
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – SMART DISHWASHER (In The Kitchen)
